HOUSE COMMITTEES

LOCAL GOVERNMENT

 

JURISDICTION: All matters directly and principally relating to autonomous regions, provinces, cities, municipalities and barangays including their revenues and expenditures.

CHAIRPERSON :

Sagarbarria, Manuel T.

District Representative
Negros Oriental, 2nd District

 
  • COMMITTEE MEMBERS
  • PRIMARY REFERRAL
  • SECONDARY REFERRAL
  • MEETINGS

 

ROSTER OF COMMITTEE MEMBERS

HB00502
[History] [Text As Filed]
 

Significance: N

Significance: L

Date Filed: 2022-11-08

Full Title, As Filed: AN ACT DECLARING MARCH 7 OF EVERY YEAR A SPECIAL NONWORKING HOLIDAY IN THE PROVINCE OF BASILAN IN COMMEMORATION OF ITS FOUNDING ANNIVERSARY, TO BE KNOWN AS "ARAW NG BASILAN", AND RECOGNIZING "TENNUN PAKARADJAAN" AS THE OFFICIAL FESTIVAL OF BASILAN PROVINCE

SCHEDULE OF MEETINGS

Unless otherwise indicated, all committee meeting venues are located at the House of Representatives Complex.


Select Week
 

27-FEBRUARY-2024 • TUESDAY
Committee/Sub-CommitteeTime and Venue
LOCAL GOVERNMENT - CANCELLED
Agenda		01:00 PM
Face-to-face meeting at Conf. Rms. 3&4, RVM Bldg.
Report of the Technical Working Group on HB 5043 – Establishing and institutionalizing a performance measurement system to promote a culture of meritocracy among local government units in the Philippines (Rep. Albert Garcia)

HB 1024 – Establishing a developmental, standardization, and incentivization framework for the establishment of smart cities and municipalities nationwide, appropriating funds therefor (Rep. Pablo John Garcia)

HB 8900 – Creating a Local Urban Planning and Development Office in every city and municipality (Rep. Ivan Howard Guintu)

HB 9288 – Mandating the creation of a Committee on Climate Change for every Sanggunian (Rep. Edgar Chatto)

HB 8546 – Promoting the welfare and adoption of stray and impounded animals, providing incentives therefor (Rep. Aniela Bianca Tolentino)

LEGISLATIVE CALENDAR
NINETEENTH CONGRESS, SECOND REGULAR SESSON

HOUSE CONCURRENT RESOLUTION NO. 16

Introduced by Representatives
Manuel Jose "Mannix" M. Dalipe and Marcelino C. Libanan

CONCURRENT RESOLUTION

PROVIDING FOR THE LEGISLATIVE CALENDAR FOR THE SECOND REGULAR SESSION OF THE NINETEENTH CONGRESS OF THE PHILIPPINES

RESOLVED BY THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THE SENATE CONCURRING, That the Legislative Calendar for the Second Regular Session of the Nineteenth Congress of the Philippines shall be as follows:

 

CALENDAR OF SESSION
SECOND REGULAR SESSION

1. Commencement of Session July 24, 2023 - September 29, 2023
2. Adjournment of Session September 30, 2023 - November 5, 2023
3. Resumption of Session November 6, 2023 - December 15, 2023
4. Adjournment of Session December 16, 2023 - January 21, 2024
5. Resumption of Session January 22, 2024 - March 22, 2024
6. Adjournment of Session March 23, 2024 - April 28, 2024
7. Resumption of Session April 29, 2024 - May 24, 2024
(Sine Die Adjournment)
8. Adjournment of Session May 25, 2024 - July 21, 2024
